Package pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1

Class ReadingRoom

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.ReadingRoom
  • public class ReadingRoom
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representation of the Reading Room in the Readers-Writers Problem. Represents place where Readers and Writers come to read/write. Reading Room's maximum capacity is 1 Writer or 5 Readers at a time. Writers can't enter Reading Room when Readers are inside, and similarly when Writers are inside, no Readers can enter.

      Reading Room constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReadingRoom

        public ReadingRoom()
        Reading Room constructor. Initializes writing lock, reading lock and counters.

    • Method Detail

      • guard

        public void guard()
        The method symbolise Guard staying in front of the Reading Room. He let Readers or Writers to enter Reading Room on condition that there is available space for them. Guard notifies readers/writers when reading room is available and let them enter.

      • canWriterEnter

        public boolean canWriterEnter()
        The method used for checking if Writer can enter the Reading Room. Writer can enter Reading Room if: - there are no Writers currently and - there are no Readers currently
        Returns:
        boolean true: Writer can enter Reading Room false: Writer can't enter Reading Room

      • canReaderEnter

        public boolean canReaderEnter()
        The method used for checking if Reader can enter the Reading Room. Reader can enter Reading Room if: - there are no Writers currently and - there are less than 5 Readers currently
        Returns:
        boolean true: Reader can enter Reading Room false: Reader can't enter Reading Room

      • decrementReadCount

        public void decrementReadCount()
        The method used for decrementing the actual number of reading Readers.

      • incrementReadCount

        public void incrementReadCount()
        The method used for decrementing the actual number of reading Readers.

      • getReadCountValue

        public int getReadCountValue()
        Returns:
        current number of Readers in the Reading Room

      • setReadCountValue

        public void setReadCountValue​(int value)
        Parameters:
        value - to set current number of Readers in the Reading Room

      • setWriteCountValue

        public void setWriteCountValue​(int value)
        Parameters:
        value - to set current number of Writers in the Reading Room

      • setWaitingWriteCount

        public void setWaitingWriteCount​(int value)
        Parameters:
        value - to set current number of Writers waiting to enter the Reading Room
